posts.postText:
Your In-Game name: Ryancarson025
Your Steam ID:STEAM_0:1:32333637
Reason: Minge (Sat at the edge of the elevator and stopped it)
Length of Ban/Date and Time of Unban: Banned on Monday or Tuesday night. Ends 12:16 4/19
What server were you playing?: TTT
Who banned you?: Quack
Why should we unban you?:
Im sorry for doing what i did, but i was just trying to protect myself. I did not know that it was against the rules to do that and i definitely did not think that it was bannable. This was the first thing that i ever did. I also think that my punishment was at most slayable or kickable, not bannable.

please post this in the correct area

viewforum.php?f=14

moved to the proper section, thanks for pointing that out Chopper.
anyway, i'll wait for Quack to reply.
What do you mean you were trying to protect yourself? There were 4 other people on the elevator that had no choice except to kill you to get to the top.
You also periodically rdm. Many people have complained about that and you being just an overall minge. The ban stays.
